full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Utilities Maintenance Standing Offer

## Offer Details

* **Tender Title (English)**: W6896-23SO98 Utilities Maintenance Standing Offer
* **Tender Title (French)**: W6896-23SO98 Offre à Commandes pour la Maintenance de Services Publics
* **Reference Number**: WS4467602348-Doc4467652570
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4467602348

## Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-06
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-28T14:00:00 (Please note the corrected closing time)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Manitoba, Canada
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

## Tender Description

The Government of Canada is seeking a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for utilities maintenance services. The successful Bidder will be required to furnish all labour, supervision, materials, equipment, maintenance, and competent operators on an "as and when required" basis in response to specific tasks required by the Department of National Defence at Canadian Forces Base/Area Support Unit Shilo (CFB Shilo). 

Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19008896?extsite=MTkwMDg4OTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19008896?extsite=MTkwMDg4OTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for complete details.

## Contact Information

* **Name**: Virakorn, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: matthew.virakorn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None

## Amendment Notice

Due to an amendment to the closing time, please disregard the original Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 28, 2024, at 12:00 PM EDT. Any bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will
